name: ChessBox Demo
description:
Made as a Final Year Production Project for University

ChessBox is a fun and exciting new 3D Chess game that has players battle it out in new unique game-modes such as Infection!, a mode that has one player shift the advantage over the course of the game with their piece stealing army of pawns, or play with a group of friends with 4 Player Chess, which has players attacking from all sides, so be careful of where you're placing that piece!, and if you're the fan of the Classic game of chess, we've got you covered! play chess as you know and love, complete with castling and other special moves this is the perfect mode for purists and newcomers alike.

Complete with custom designed chess sets that follow some of your favorite themes: Pirates, Vikings and more!, complete with animations get sunk in the game and enjoy the relaxing setting with the game's laid-back music.
